name: Rankyaku: Amane Dachi
description: An advanced Rankyaku technique where Kaku spins his elongated giraffe neck at high speed, creating a powerful centrifugal force. This generates a devastating cutting attack with extended range and sharpness capable of bisecting entire buildings.
effectiveness: Can slice through massive structures like the Tower of Justice
weaknesses: Requires the user to be in giraffe form to utilize the long neck for spinning

name: Seimei Kikan
description: An advanced technique that allows the user to control every part of their body through conscious channeling. This includes controlling normally involuntary functions and body parts, such as hair growth and movement, digestion, and body shape.
effectiveness: Grants supernatural control over one's own body, enabling unique combat applications
weaknesses: Requires extensive training (Kumadori claims thousands of years metaphorically)

name: Kami Shibari
description: Using Seimei Kikan, Kumadori extends and controls his hair like tentacles or whips to grab and bind opponents. The hair moves with the fluidity of octopus tentacles, though Kumadori insists they resemble a lion's mane.
effectiveness: Can restrain opponents and control their movement
weaknesses: Hair can potentially be cut or burned

name: Haru Gin Jo
description: A Seimei Kikan technique that allows Kumadori to control his body's digestion and physical form. He can rapidly digest food and return his body to its normal shape after becoming enlarged from eating.
effectiveness: Allows quick recovery and body manipulation

name: Franky Boxing
japaneseName: フランキーボクシング
description: Standard boxing maneuvers executed with devastating force due to Franky's steel fists and cyborg-enhanced physical strength. What would be ordinary punches become extremely powerful attacks.
effectiveness: Combines skilled boxing technique with superhuman cyborg strength to deliver devastating punches

name: Golden Hour
description: Kalifa spreads soap bubbles across her victim's body using her Awa Awa no Mi powers. The bubbles drain the target's physical strength and make their skin extremely smooth and slippery, severely impairing mobility and leaving them helpless.
effectiveness: Extremely effective at incapacitating opponents by draining their strength
weaknesses: The bubble effects can be washed away with water
